allow: Bash(echo "=== Criando coleção sharded via Qdrant API ===" curl -s -X PUT "http://localhost:9000/qdrant/collections/shard_test"  -H "Content-Type: application/json"  -d '{ ""vectors"": { ""size"": 128, ""distance"": ""Euclid"" }, ""shard_count"": 4 }' echo "" echo "=== Verificando ===" curl -s "http://localhost:9000/collections")
